form.label: ATT&CK Matrix Risk (Business View)
form.description: This dashboard portrays risk in your environment through the lens of RBA and the MITRE ATT&CK framework

search.query: | tstats values(All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic) as mitre_tactic, values(All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique) as mitre_technique values(All_Risk.savedsearch_description) as search_name values(All_Risk.risk_object_type) as risk_object_type values(All_Risk.impact) as impact from datamodel=Risk by _time, All_Risk.risk_object | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Risk")`

index=risk annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id=* | table search_name risk_object risk_object_type annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id | lookup mitre_matrix_list.csv TechniqueIdCombined AS annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id OUTPUT Technique, Sub_Technique, Tactic | table Tactic Technique Sub_Technique | stats count as technique_count by Tactic Technique Sub_Technique | eval IsSubTechnique=if(Sub_Technique!="-","Yes","No") | lookup mitre_matrix_list Tactic Technique OUTPUT Sub_Technique AS Sub_Technique_List | eval Sub_Technique_List=mvfilter(Sub_Technique_List!="-") | eval sub_technique_count=case(Sub_Technique!="-",technique_count) | outputlookup attack_environment_counts.csv

| inputlookup ootb_searches_and_technique_ids.csv | lookup mitre_matrix_list.csv TechniqueIdCombined AS mitre_technique OUTPUT Technique, Sub_Technique, Tactic | table Tactic Technique Sub_Technique | stats count as technique_count by Tactic Technique Sub_Technique | eval IsSubTechnique=if(Sub_Technique!="-","Yes","No") | lookup mitre_matrix_list Tactic Technique OUTPUT Sub_Technique AS Sub_Technique_List | eval Sub_Technique_List=mvfilter(Sub_Technique_List!="-") | eval sub_technique_count=case(Sub_Technique!="-",technique_count) | outputlookup rr_rule_environment_counts.csv

| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Risk by All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic, All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique, All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id, All_Risk.risk_object | rename All_Risk.* as * | lookup mitre_matrix_list TechniqueIdCombined as annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id OUTPUT Tactic, Technique Sub_Technique TechniqueIdCombined | stats count as risk_object_count by Tactic Technique Sub_Technique risk_object TechniqueIdCombined | eval risk_object=risk_object."::".risk_object_count | mvcombine delim="," risk_object | nomv risk_object | eval IsSubTechnique=if(Sub_Technique!="-","Yes","No") | eval sub_technique_count=risk_object_count | table TechniqueIdCombined IsSubTechnique sub_technique_count Tactic Technique Sub_Technique risk_object risk_object_count | outputlookup risk_object_attack_environment_counts.csv

single.title: Reduction in notables by using the Attribution based approach

search.query: index=notable |eval notable=if(like(search_name,"Risk%"),"Attribution Notable","Notable")|stats count by notable |transpose 0 header_field=notable |eval p=round(100-('Attribution Notable'/Notable)*100,1) |table p
index=notable |eval notable=if(like(search_name,"Threat - ATT&CK%"),"Attribution Notable","Notable") |timechart span=1h count by notable
| tstats count from datamodel=Risk
`notable` | search search_name="*Risk*" | stats count

|inputlookup mitre_attack_lookup | stats dc(mitre_technique_id) as total_techniques by mitre_tactic |append [| rest splunk_server=local count=0 /services/saved/searches|search action.risk="1" action.correlationsearch.annotations!="" |table action.correlationsearch.annotations|spath input=action.correlationsearch.annotations|rename mitre_attack{} as mitre_technique_id|mvexpand mitre_technique_id|lookup mitre_attack_lookup mitre_technique_id OUTPUT mitre_tactic|stats dc(mitre_technique_id) as num_covered_techniques by mitre_tactic]|stats values(total_techniques) as total_techniques, values(num_covered_techniques) as num_covered_techniques by mitre_tactic | fillnull value="0" num_covered_techniques | eval combo = num_covered_techniques." of ".total_techniques |eval perc=round((num_covered_techniques/total_techniques)*100,1) |eval perc="(".perc."%)" |table mitre_tactic, combo,perc | transpose 0 header_field=mitre_tactic |fields - column

|inputlookup mitre_attack_lookup | stats dc(mitre_technique_id) as total_techniques by mitre_tactic |append [|tstats `summariesonly` dc(All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_technique_id) as num_detected_techniques from datamodel=Risk by All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic|rename All_Risk.annotations.mitre_attack.mitre_tactic as mitre_tactic|fillnull value="0" num_detected_techniques] |stats values(total_techniques) as total_techniques, values(num_detected_techniques) as num_detected_techniques by mitre_tactic | fillnull value="0" num_detected_techniques | eval combo = num_detected_techniques." of ".total_techniques |table mitre_tactic, combo | transpose 0 header_field=mitre_tactic |fields - column
stats count by mitre_tactic
stats count by mitre_technique
timechart count by mitre_tactic usenull=f
timechart count by mitre_technique usenull=f

panel.title: Attribution Scoring by Risk Object Priority

search.query: |from datamodel:"Risk"."All_Risk"|search risk_object_priority=* risk_object_type=*|bin span=1h _time|stats sparkline sum(calculated_risk_score) as "Attribution Scoring Total" by risk_object_priority|eventstats sum("Attribution Scoring Total") as "total"|eval Percentage=round(('Attribution Scoring Total'/total)*100,1)|fields - "Attribution Scoring Total" total|sort - Percentage

|from datamodel:"Risk"."All_Risk"|search risk_object_category=* risk_object_type=user|bin span=1h _time|stats sparkline sum(calculated_risk_score) as "Attribution Scoring Total" by risk_object_category|eventstats sum("Attribution Scoring Total") as "total"|eval Percentage=round(('Attribution Scoring Total'/total)*100,1)|fields - "Attribution Scoring Total" total|sort - Percentage

|from datamodel:"Risk"."All_Risk"|search risk_object_category=* risk_object_type=system|bin span=1h _time|stats sparkline sum(calculated_risk_score) as "Attribution Scoring Total" by risk_object_category|eventstats sum("Attribution Scoring Total") as "total"|eval Percentage=round(('Attribution Scoring Total'/total)*100,1)|fields - "Attribution Scoring Total" total|sort - Percentage

| search risk_object_type=user | stats values(mitre_tactic) as Tactic values(mitre_technique) as Techniques dc(mitre_tactic) as count by risk_object | sort - count | fields - count | rename risk_object as "Identity"

| search risk_object_type=system | stats values(mitre_tactic) as Tactic values(mitre_technique) as Techniques dc(mitre_tactic) as count by risk_object | sort - count | fields - count | rename risk_object as "Asset"

index=_internal sourcetype=scheduler NOT savedsearch_name="hreat - RR - TEST - Rule" savedsearch_name="* - RR - *" OR savedsearch_name="Threat - ATT&CK Tactic Threshold Exceeded*" | extract pairdelim=",", kvdelim="=", auto=f | stats avg(result_count) as avg_results max(result_count) as max_results sparkline avg(run_time) as avg_runtime max(run_time) as max_runtime count AS execution_count by savedsearch_name, app | join savedsearch_name type=outer [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | fields title description eai:acl.app eai:acl.sharing eai:acl.owner cron_schedule dispatch.earliest_time dispatch.latest_time, disabled actions | rename title AS savedsearch_name eai:acl.app AS App eai:acl.owner AS Owner cron_schedule AS "Cron Schedule" dispatch.earliest_time AS "Dispatch Earliest Time" dispatch.latest_time AS "Dispatch Latest Time" actions AS "Adaptive Response Actions", eai:acl.sharing AS Sharing]
|eval comment="This is just to make the demo work below since we do not have execution results in _internal" | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | search title="* - RIR - *" OR title="* - RR - *" | fields title description eai:acl.app eai:acl.sharing eai:acl.owner cron_schedule dispatch.earliest_time dispatch.latest_time, disabled actions | rename title AS savedsearch_name eai:acl.app AS App eai:acl.owner AS Owner cron_schedule AS "Cron Schedule" dispatch.earliest_time AS "Dispatch Earliest Time" dispatch.latest_time AS "Dispatch Latest Time" actions AS "Adaptive Response Actions", eai:acl.sharing AS Sharing]
| join savedsearch_name type=outer [ | from datamodel:"Risk"."All_Risk" | stats sum(calculated_risk_score) AS "total_risk" by source | rename source as savedsearch_name]
| rename savedsearch_name AS "Saved Search Name" description AS Description | eval Enabled = if(disabled=1, "False", "True") | sort - avg_runtime | makemv delim="," "Adaptive Response Actions" | eval avg_runtime = round(avg_runtime, 1) | eval avg_results = round(avg_results, 0) | table "Saved Search Name", Description, App, Enabled, total_risk, "Adaptive Response Actions", "Cron Schedule", "Dispatch Earliest Time", "Dispatch Latest Time", execution_count, sparkline, avg_results, max_results, avg_runtime, max_runtime
